commands.title: Log navigate to Date Format
commands.description: Sets the date format used in the log files.

commands.title: Log navigate to Date RegExp
commands.description: Sets the regular expression to match the date in the log files.

commands.title: Log navigate to Search Date
commands.description: Sets the date to search for in the log files (YYYY-MM-DD).

commands.title: Log navigate to Search Time
commands.description: Sets the time to search for in the log file and Runs the search.

commands.title: Calculate Similar Line Counts
commands.description: Calculates counts of similar lines in the log file and displays them in descending order.

commands.title: Draw Log Timeline
commands.description: Draws a chart containing a timeline of log file records.

acacia-log.logDateFormat.description: The date format used in the log files.

acacia-log.logDateRegex.description: The regular expression to match the date in the log files.

acacia-log.logSearchDate.description: The date to search for in the log files (YYYY-MM-DD).

acacia-log.logSearchTime.description: The time to search for in the log files (HH:mm:ss).

acacia-log.logFilePath.description: The path to the log file.

acacia-log.patternsFilePath.description: The path to the search patterns JSON file.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
